name: Emily's Journey
description:
This is a reimagined version of a 3D metroid-like game for the Metroidvania Month 5 gamejam.

Note: This prototype is an early demonstration of a small section. The graphics and aesthetics aren't the final version.

Known issues:

  • Some weird looking character animations
  • Bad performance with mid-low end computers
  • Missing ' in title text (issue with font)
